synopsis.text:
Yanagiâ€™s life as an orphan takes an unexpected turn when he encounters a peculiar disciple of his late father. The eccentric man leads him back to his birthplace, Ayakajima, an archipelago of seven islands shrouded in mystery and legend. The islands are said to be home to enigmatic beings called Mitama and dragons. Yanagi soon discovers that he, like his father, possesses a unique power to control water and pacify the Mitama, who can transform into dangerous monsters known as Ara-Mitama.

As he returns to his roots, Yanagi meets his father's other disciples, who are tasked with preserving the harmony of Ayakajima. However, the delicate balance of the islands is under threat, and Yanagi must confront his past traumas and master his powers to prevent the looming chaos. As he navigates the complex relationships of partners, rivals, and brothers, Yanagi embarks on a journey to fulfill his father's legacy and protect his birthplace from the impending disaster.
